WELCOME-TITLE: Tōmōni 는 최초의 social discovery app 입니다.
WELCOME-CONTENT: 여러분의 가까운 곳에서 새로운 친구를 찾아보세요.
TOMO-P1: Tomo stays where you put it and make your activities visible to all nearby users, then help you communicate with your potential partners.
TOMO-P2: No need to fill any forms. No need to pay to get to meet new people.
TOMO-P3: Just drop a tomo where you ans to hang out.
DROP-P: Tomo filters keep content interesting to you.
CHAT-P: Use chat to share details and meetup.
